title: Ivyone Pure Cotton Dry Wipes, 200 Wipes, Biodegradable, Chemical-Free and Plastic-Free Wipes, for Baby Care, Nappy Liners, Makeup Removing, Patient Cleaning and Pet Cleaning
features: 【Packaging May Vary】Packaging you receive could be plastic or cardboard boxes, as we are trying to upgrade our product with eco-friendlier packaging. The product is the exact same.
【100% Cotton】 Made from 100% high-quality cotton that is completely plastic-free and biodegradable. Super soft and highly absorbent.
【Chemical Free】 Free from dye, fragrance and chlorine. Designed for sensitive and delicate skin.
【Dry or Homemade Wet Wipes】 Use dry or just add water to make your own fresh and pure wet wipes.
【Multi Use】 Ideal for cleaning up after babies from top to bottoms, removing makeup, intimate care, patient care, pet cleaning and more.
description: Product Description Soft to the touch, kind to the planet and simply luxurious best describe Ivyone’s pure cotton dry wipes. Made from 100% natural quality cotton fabric, Ivyone wipes are plastic-free and gentle enough to use on sensitive skin. The delicate and plush wipes are safe for babies owing to its all-cotton consistency. A unique spunlace & non-woven technique makes it durable enough for cleaning babies, removing makeup and drying your skin without falling apart. Ivyone prides itself in the creation of a deluxe dry wipe range that is free from fragrances, dyes and chemicals. Ivyone is created in the UK by a group of creative, passionate nature lovers. We are dedicated to providing high-quality products that help people to look after themselves, their beloved ones, and the planet they live on. About Ivyone Pure Cotton Dry Wipes 100% Natural and Plastic-Free Wipes Ivyone wipes are made from 100% natural high quality cotton fiber. Unlike polyester that most wet wipes are made of, cotton is plastic-free and better in terms of softness and absorbency. Suitable for Sensitive Skin and Newborns Ivyone wipes are free from chlorine, dyes, preservatives, fragrances, providing the ultimate safeness to you and your baby. Protect sensitive skins from irritations and allergies. Make Your Own Fresh Wet Wipes You can use Ivyone wipes dry, or make your own fresh wet wipes by just adding water. This allows you to avoid preservatives and any chemicals that most ready-made wet wipes contain. Strong Durable & Lint-Free With the patented spunlace nonwoven technique, Ivyone wipes are strong, durable and rinse-able to continue using without falling apart or leaving any residue. Ivyone wipes meet all your needs Be Kind to yourself, your little ones and our planet with Ivyone pure cotton dry wipes. Ivyone wipes are pieces of cloths that you can add pure water or whatever ingredients you like to make them wet wipes when you need. These totally natural, chemical-free and plastic-free wipes are perfect for everyone. Great to use for baby care, makeup removal, face cleanse, incontinence care, intimate care and etc. FAQs: Q: Does it suitable for vegan? Yes. Ivyone wipes are suitable for vegans. They are made from natural and sustainable cotton fiber. No tests on animals and no animal-derived ingredients used. Q: Are they flushable? Please do not flush Ivyone wipes or any other wipes. It takes 4-6 weeks for Ivyone wipes to break down.
